modName: Glow Ebony Armor by Mari - DELETED
summary: Re-texture ebony armor in the 6 colours.
descriptionHtml:
I like everything luminous, so this retexture was born.
6 colors to choose from. Download only one color:
[color=#6d9eeb][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4ygdWjimRjbRXZsTTJ4bWxBOG8/view]Blue[/url][/color]
[color=#93c47d][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4ygdWjimRjbZ1Fvc2tKUk92VFU/view]Green[/url][/color]
[color=#e69138][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4ygdWjimRjbUmR5VURiX3pkb1U/view]Gold[/url][/color]
[color=#ff0000][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4ygdWjimRjbdmFqNGlWTmNHNFk/view]Red[/url][/color]
[url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4ygdWjimRjbaU5SMVpPSmg4ZEk/view]White[/url]
[color=#c27ba0][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4ygdWjimRjbNU9rNlFMZU41UlU/view]Pink[/url]
[/color][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4ygdWjimRjbWGViMUpicUxNRkE/view]All colours [/url]

Installation:
Place the Textures and meshes folders in the Data folder.
author: ArtByMari
